chapters.title: Chapter 2: Whirlpools in the Pattern
chapters.info: Loial, p. 56 (40)—Ogier from Stedding Shangtai, son of Arent son of Halan. He is fond of books and history, and is an excellent Treesinger. He is writing a book about his travels with the three ta'veren he meets, Rand al'Thor, Mat Cauthon, and Perrin Aybara. Loial is constantly afraid that his mother will find him and try to marry him off and settle him down; he is only ninety years old, which by Ogier standards is not yet old enough to leave the stedding by himself. Loial is sad that most humans do not remember the Ogier—and horrified that some see him and think he is a Trolloc. See also Arent; Halan.
